did.unittitle: Franz E. Daniel Memorial Service Papers

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: American Federation of Labor-Congress of Industrial Organizations (AFL-CIO)

did.abstract: Materials from the memorial service for Franz E. Daniel on September 29, 1976.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Franz Daniel was born in Osceola, Missouri on April 4, 1904. A graduate of the University of Wisconsin, Daniel worked for the Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, the Industrial Union of Marine and Shipbuilding Workers, and the CIO. He died on August 19, 1976, at the age of 72.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials from the memorial service for Franz E. Daniel on September 29, 1976. Included are a transcript of the service, AFL-CIO press release, program, and photographs.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
